Text: dude, there is a subbed version of this uploaded. this is stupid...
I was on a tour far away from internet otherwise I could've uploaded the subs two days ago.
so what?! why upload this in the first place? we have a subbed version! the quality on this one is not any better...............
dupes are bad. one day you will realise, when half your torrents die.

Of course dupes are bad, but this torrent is not a dupe...plus torrents die because of greedy idiots running as fast as they can with their ass on top of their head the moment download ends and not giving each other a single byte.
these kind of torrents die because of dupes, and this is a useless dupe. one day you will realise.
